about_the_game:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the eight newly added patients by completing the Older Adult Cases scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Older Adult Cases Package:

  • 80 yo male struck by car
  • 83 yo male with shortness of breath
  • 65 yo female s/p collision with utility pole
  • 60 yo male with left sided chest pain
  • 69 yo female with blood per rectum
  • 58 yo male s/p motor cycle collision
  • 60 yo female with headache
  • 81 yo male s/p MVC
detailed_description:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the eight newly added patients by completing the Older Adult Cases scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Older Adult Cases Package:

  • 80 yo male struck by car
  • 83 yo male with shortness of breath
  • 65 yo female s/p collision with utility pole
  • 60 yo male with left sided chest pain

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320 M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
